reason: The way your eyes sparkle when you laugh at my silly jokes
How you always remember my coffee order perfectly
Your kindness to everyone you meet, even strangers
Safe, loved, and like I can be completely myself
The cute sound you make when you're concentrating
How your whole face lights up when you see me
How excited you get talking about our future together
The way you scrunch your nose when you disagree
Your patience with me when I'm being difficult
Like I'm the luckiest person in the world every single day
